body:
We were trying to signify that InputBuffer takes ownership of `var`, but the standard way to do that with smart shared pointers is just to take it by value:

See (e) in: https://herbsutter.com/2013/06/05/gotw-91-solution-smart-pointer-parameters/

body_text:
We were trying to signify that InputBuffer takes ownership of var, but the standard way to do that with smart shared pointers is just to take it by value:
